attributes.action: halt the sale of so called 'surplus land' at the new Bishopbriggs Academy, Glasgow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surplus land has been created at the site of the new Bishopbriggs Academy which means pupils will have to share playing fields with two nearby primary schools, create a dangerous parental drop off area and leave the school too close to houses in Torr Road
